summary: All seven requirements are substantially implemented in the diff. REQ-1 through REQ-7 each have corresponding new components, hooks, and CSS. Minor observation: the LandingPageNav does not include a 'Pricing' anchor section link, which the spec explicitly calls out as an expected nav target. Overall implementation is thorough and well-aligned with the spec.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each major section of the landing page has a corresponding anchor ID; Navigation links include a Pricing section
missing_requirements.reason: The LandingPageNav defines sections: hero, carousel, how-it-works, testimonials, cta â€” but does not include a 'Pricing' anchor link. The spec explicitly calls out 'Features, How It Works, Pricing, Testimonials' as expected nav targets.
